issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.3 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #2980b9, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.3:1. Recommendation:  change background to #257cb5.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.3:1. Recommendation:  change background to #257cb5.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > header > nav > button
